"Rasta": "Have you seen our Mining Rig? It's the huge machine just a short distance from the City."

"The Rig itself broke a long time ago...
But you can still find a lot of Ore around there, so we send regular patrols out to collect it."
"But I've lost contact with my friend, Ratel, after he went out on one of those patrols..."
"It could just be that he encountered a sandstorm and suffered a communications failure."
"Meteorn Mags are more advanced than ours, so you should have an easier time getting back in touch with him."
"Would you please go and find Ratel? I'd really appreciate it."
